com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.listeners

Class SCUISessionChangeListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.listeners.SCUISessionChangeListener

  • public class SCUISessionChangeListener
extends java.lang.Object
    SCUISessionChangeListener is a holder class which maintains a list of ISCUISessionChangeAware listeners.
    When the session is changed, then each individual listeners ISCUISessionChangeAware#handleSessionChange(SCUIContext, boolean) method is called. The method will return a map of attributes that need to be set in the new session. rasrinivasan

      • notifyListeners

        public static SCUISessionChangeData notifyListeners(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                    boolean hasUserChanged)
        Utility method which invokes all registered ISCUISessionChangeAware listeners. SCUISessionChangeListener#addListener(ISCUISessionChangeAware) uiContext The current UI Context hasUserChanged is true if user has changed like from guest to actual user; otherwise false. SCUISessionChangeData object containing session and local session attributes as maps
